abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Additional
            Financing for the Punjab Education Sector Project (PESP) for
            Pakistan are to improve access and equity, and the quality
            and relevance of education in Punjab. The project major
            changes include: (i) reallocation of unutilized funds from
            the technical assistance component (component two) of the
            PESP to the Program financing component (component one); and
            (ii) cancellation of one half of the amount allocated for
            the disbursement linked indicator (DLI) for up-gradation of
            schools given that the (sub) target for upgrading schools
            from the primary to middle levels has not been achieved. The
            latter applies to both PESP and PESP Additional Financing
            (PESP AF).
